title: ASK ANDY:  How to Build a Customer Base (And Two More Questions) - MFQA1
description: In this first "Ask Andy" episode of The MFCEO Project, Andy Frisella answers questions from listeners about mentorship, building a customer base, and choosing whether it's right to get an investor or go it alone.
content:encoded: In this first "Ask Andy" episode of The MFCEO Project, Andy Frisella answers questions from listeners about mentorship, building a customer base, and choosing whether it's right to get an investor or go it alone.
itunes:subtitle: Short Q&A Episode with The MFCEO
